pre_caption: This is a time-lapse scenery shot of a public square featuring an ornate white monument. The camera moves forward and tilts up towards the monument as the clouds are seen moving rapidly across the sky. The scene contrasts the traditional architecture of the monument with a modern skyscraper under construction in the background.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
